atomic_tests.name: Deploy Docker container
atomic_tests.description: Adversaries may deploy containers based on retrieved or built malicious images or from benign images that download and execute malicious payloads at runtime. They can do this using docker create and docker start commands. Kinsing & Doki was exploited using this technique.

executor.name: bash
executor.command:
docker build -t t1610 $PathtoAtomicsFolder/T1610/src/
docker run --name t1610_container --rm -itd t1610 bash /tmp/script.sh
executor.cleanup_command:
docker stop t1610_container
docker rmi -f t1610:latest

dependencies.get_prereq_command: if [ "" == "`which docker`" ]; then echo "Docker Not Found"; if [ -n "`which apt-get`" ]; then sudo apt-get -y install docker ; elif [ -n "`which yum`" ]; then sudo yum -y install docker ; fi ; else echo "Docker installed"; fi
